metadata.title: CVE-2022-34293 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: wolfSSL before 5.4.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of servicevia DTLS because a check for return-routability can be skipped.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
